name: GGG
description:
Gold Guns Girls

***  IMPORTANT  ***  To fully install this game please follow these instructions provided from YoYo Games, the makers of GameMaker Studio 2:  

https://help.yoyogames.com/hc/en-us/articles/216753558-Mac-apps-damaged-when-dow...

This is my first game, built with GameMaker Studio 2.  Inspired by the classic GBA game WarioWare.  I had an idea of making a frenetic micro mini game collection but set to a song.  I'm a fan of the band Metric and thought that the song Gold Guns Girls would be perfect to try this idea with.  

This game was made for portfolio showcase purposes only and all art assets were found for free online.
